T-shirt Background

T-Shirt Background is a script sniffing javascript that sniff data-background-n attributes for spesific background image insertion. The n is width value in pixels that will be used if the attribute is smaller than current screen size.

By default, this plugins will read data-background attribute for default value.

<div
     data-background="url(background.jpg) center center no-repeat"
     data-background-1000="url(background1000.jpg) center center no-repeat"
     data-background-500="url(background500.jpg) center center no-repeat">
</div>
